ovdesc.p: A live file that holds the basic details for XML statement
This table will contain the details for both CAMT052 and CAMT053 messages
For CAMT053, the table will be updated during Close of Business
For CAMT052, the table will be updated either on authorization of DE.STATEMENT.REQUEST record or after the AC.XML.INTRMSTMT.GENERATE service

desc.p: Id will be in the format of ACCOUNT-STMTDATE.FREQUENCY.COMPANYCODE-MESSAGETYPE
